import React from "react"; import Head from "next/head"; import HealthArticle from "../components/health-article"; import "../../style.scss"; interface contentProps { contents: string; } export default function Index(props: contentProps) { return (
Protalk App
); } const getHeader = new Headers({ "Content-Type": "application/json", Authorization: "eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJpZCI6IjVmMjJjYzAwYzFhNWVlNzljYmM2ZWZkYyIsImlhdCI6MTU5ODIwMDAwOX0.9meBFHjZjfoSw0tAYc4NMqfb1iaNT_BSubE9DQAiiHU" }); export const getServerSideProps = async () => { const res = await fetch( "http://13.127.122.195:8080/apiV2/article/5f8962de82ae667ab67e62b4", { method: "GET", headers: getHeader } ); const data = await res.json(); console.log(data.article.articleMarkdown); const t = `
![image](https://images-goldbox.s3.ap-south-1.amazonaws.com/91c35228081e4a8a8502427b1fb49e2f.png)
`; const test = `
![image](https://images-goldbox.s3.ap-south-1.amazonaws.com/91c35228081e4a8a8502427b1fb49e2f.png)
> # If You Really Want to Optimize Your Diet, Focus on Fiber
![Consultant Profile](https://i.ibb.co/b5JPXV4/Image-216.png)
|
Arjun Sharma
Diet Expert
| ------| ------| | |
There are many cohort studies that have shown people who eat less fiber are at high risk for developing Crohn’s disease,” Kaplan says. One of the most robust of these studies was a 2013 report from researchers at Harvard Medical School that looked at diet and health data collected from roughly 170,000 women over a period of more than 26 years. It found that those women who landed in the top fifth of the population in terms of fiber intakes were 40% less likely to have been diagnosed with Crohn’s disease than women who landed in the bottom fifth.
> ### Fiber and Health
![Fiber Health](https://images-goldbox.s3.ap-south-1.amazonaws.com/a294887a9ea647d79c7e9bd01ec4699a.png)
> # Avoid restaurant food for diet.
There are many cohort studies that have shown people who eat less fiber are at high risk for developing Crohn's disease," Kaplan says. One of the most robust of these studies was a 2013 report from researchers at Harvard Medical School.
> # The average person is not even remotely aware of the importance of fiber.
There are many cohort studies that have shown people who eat less fiber are at high risk for developing Crohn's disease," Kaplan says. One of the most robust of these studies was a 2013 report from researchers at Harvard Medical College.
There are many cohort studies that have shown people who eat less fiber are at high risk for developing Crohn's disease," Kaplan says. One of the most robust of these studies was a 2013 report from researchers at Harvard Medical School
